name: nonconceptual
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not based on abstract ideas or principles: These insights are quite different from the ordinary non-conceptual way of speaking about identity. Her style of art is non-conceptual and egalitarian.
More examplesFewer examplesHe emphasized the importance of including non-conceptual elements in any analysis of politics.The claim is that belief has conceptual content, whereas experience has nonconceptual content.She identifies free play as a nonconceptual mental state.They said the former director was practical to the point of lacking any strategic framework and his whole operation was non-conceptual.
